1.0.name: wordpress/spreadfirefox
1.0.description:
Displays a browser specific "Update to Firefox" image on your wordpress sidebar. For IE6 users, a top drop down banner also encourages an upgrade.

This plugin works in correlation with the affiliate program at Spread Firefox (http://www.spreadfirefox.com), but is not required.
